description:
Luke, without a doubt, has got to be the shyest guy I have ever worked with.
His bashfulness doesn't seem to match the fact he has an incredible body and clearly is a hot dude. He rates himself an 8 on a 10 point Shyness scale, but you can clearly see he is probably a 10.
But it is really adorable and refreshing to see a dude with a hot body be humble and somewhat bashful.
Luke hangs with Teo and Sky, and you can tell they are all good friends and I think it is awesome that Teo recommended him to me.
Luke came in to do the solo and the following day a Serviced video. But weeks before I was getting nervous text messages about the oral. I let him off the hook and told him to just see how the Solo went.
Afterwards he was apologizing that he just didn't think he could do it, and I had to agree. The solo is fine, no issues at all, but he doesn't have a hint of exhibitionism to go beyond (though if he said he'd give it a try, I probably wouldn't think twice!)
It's a great solo with a super hot dude. He is just pretty dang shy!
title: Luke - Solo
